title: G Fall
description: Brace yourself for a heart-pounding, high-speed plunge into a dizzying freefall

title: Equinox
description: A thrill monster that flips you around 360 degrees in a gravity-defying spin.

title: Water Pendulum
description: Hold on tight as you glide up and down on a water tube across a U-shaped slide!

title: Crazy Cars
description: Dash and crash into your friends’ cars in your very own Formula 1 circuit!

title: Sky Ring
description: Shoot up a sky-high tower for a birds-eye view of Wonderla Kochi!

title: Mission Interstellar
description: Blast through cosmic chaos on a wild, out-of-this-world space ride!

title: Space Gun
description: See the world upside-down, dangling from high up above the ground!

title: Recoil
description: India’s first-ever action-packed reverse looping roller coaster ride!

title: Hyperverse
description: Get transported to another world as you soar through a breathtaking 3D metaverse!

title: Spinning Coaster
description: A heart-pounding roller coaster ride that twists, turns and spins you around!

title: Drop Loop
description: Slide down a sky-high slope, twist through a loop and make a splashy exit!

title: Sea Lagoon
description: Get soaked, splashed and sprayed in this thrilling pool paradise!

title: Wave Pool
description: Experience the bliss of waves washing over you, far away from the sea.

title: Korneto
description: Slide, swirl and splash through a whirling vortex on this slippery ride!

title: Bullet
description: Navigate through twists, tunnels and loops on 3 epic water slides!

title: Screw
description: Get ready to rush through dizzying turns and loops at mind-blowing speeds!

title: Drop & Tornado
description: Zoom down through a twisty maze of 4 thrilling tunnels into a splashy escape!

title: Happy Kangaroo
description: Plummet into a safe freefall with a tall & cheerful kangaroo!

title: Mini Coco Cup
description: Spin around in a gigantic cup placed on a rotating turntable floor!

title: Carousel
description: Gallop around on colourful horses like a seasoned cowboy!

title: Pony Train
description: Hop onto a chariot-pulled pony ride through the world of fantasy!

title: Kiddies Wheel
description: A miniature giant wheel designed to give your children a taste of real thrill without being half as scary.

title: Funky Monkey
description: Plummet into a safe freefall with a tall & playful monkey!

title: Jack-O-Coaster
description: Ride on the edge with sharp curves, steep climbs and dizzying drops!
